entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Chatham-Kent
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 6:09 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -2.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chatham-Kent 12:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: -2.2°C
Pressure: 101.5 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 72 %
Wind Chill: -5
Dewpoint: -6.6°C
Wind: ENE 8 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of light snow in the morning. Snow or ice pellets beginning near noon. Risk of freezing rain in the afternoon. Local snow and ice pellet amount 2 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain mixed with freezing rain. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Rain or freezing rain. Local rainfall amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 near midnight then becoming light before morning. Temperature steady near zero. Forecast issued 6:16 PM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
